languages.text: {n}Женщина пытается изобразить приветственный солдатский жест, но изорванное железом сухожилие лишило ее власти над пальцами.{/n} "Аколит Инквизиции Танакия Калбергария. Милостью Лорд-инквизитора Калькасара комендант режимного объекта "Эпитафия-1". Или того, что от него осталось".

{n}The woman tries to salute you, but the metal cutting through her tendons has cost her the control of her fingers.{/n} "Tanakia Calbergaria, Inquisition acolyte. And, by the grace of Lord Inquisitor Calcazar, the warden of the Epitaph 1 covert facility. Or whatever's left of it."
languages.original_text: {n}Женщина пытается изобразить приветственный солдатский жест, но изорванное железом сухожилие лишило ее власти над пальцами.{/n} "Аколит Инквизиции Танакия Калбергария. Милостью Лорд-инквизитора Калькасара комендант режимного объекта "Эпитафия-1". Или того, что от него осталось".

traits.locale_text: {n}The woman tries to salute you, but the cut sinew cost her the control of her fingers.{/n} "Tanakia Calbergaria, the Inquisition Acolyte. By the grace of the Lord Inquisitor Calcazar, the commandant of the 'Epitaph-1' regime object. Or whatever's left of it."
traits.speaker: Tanakia

traits.locale_text: {n}The woman tries to salute you, but the cut sinew cost her the control of her fingers.{/n} "Tanakia Calbergaria, the Inquisition Acolyte. By the grace of the Lord Inquisitor Calcazar, the commandant of the 'Epitaph-1' regime object. Or whatever's left of it."
traits.speaker: Tanakia

traits.locale_text: {n}The woman tries to salute you, but the cut sinew cost her the control of her fingers.{/n} "Tanakia Calbergaria, the Inquisition Acolyte. By the grace of Lord Inquisitor Calcazar, the warden of the Epitaph-1 top-secret unit. Or whatever's left of it."
traits.speaker: Tanakia

traits.locale_text: {n}The woman tries to salute you, but the cut sinew cost her the control of her fingers.{/n} "Tanakia Calbergaria, the Inquisition Acolyte. By the grace of Lord Inquisitor Calcazar, the warden of the Epitaph-1 top-secret unit. Or whatever's left of it."
traits.speaker: Tanakia

traits.locale_text: {n}The woman tries to salute you, but the metal cutting through her tendons has cost her the control of her fingers.{/n} "Tanakia Calbergaria, Inquisition acolyte. And, by the grace of Lord Inquisitor Calcazar, the warden of the Epitaph 1 covert facility. Or whatever's left of it."
traits.speaker: Tanakia

traits.locale_text: {n}The woman tries to salute you, but the metal cutting through her tendons has cost her the control of her fingers.{/n} "Tanakia Calbergaria, Inquisition acolyte. And, by the grace of Lord Inquisitor Calcazar, the warden of the Epitaph 1 covert facility. Or whatever's left of it."
traits.speaker: Tanakia

languages.text: {n}La femme tente de vous saluer, mais le métal tranchant ses tendons l'empêche de contrôler ses doigts.{/n} « Tanakia Calbergaria, acolyte de l'Inquisition par la grâce du seigneur inquisiteur Calcazar, gardien du complexe secret d'Épitaphe-1. Ou du moins, ce qu'il en reste. »
languages.original_text: {n}The woman tries to salute you, but the metal cutting through her tendons has cost her the control of her fingers.{/n} "Tanakia Calbergaria, Inquisition acolyte. And, by the grace of Lord Inquisitor Calcazar, the warden of the Epitaph 1 covert facility. Or whatever's left of it."

traits.locale_text: {n}La femme tente de vous saluer, mais un tendon coupé l'empêche de contrôler ses doigts.{/n} « Tanakia Calbergaria, acolyte de l'Inquisition par la grâce du seigneur inquisiteur Calcazar, gardien de l'unité secrète d'Épitaphe-1. Ou du moins, ce qu'il en reste. »
traits.speaker: Tanakia

languages.text: {n}La mujer intenta cuadrarse, pero el metal que tiene atravesado en los tendones le impide controlar los dedos.{/n} «Tanakia Calbergaria, acólita de la Inquisición y alcaide de la instalación confidencial Epitafio-1 por gracia del Lord Inquisidor Calcazar. O de lo que queda de ella».
languages.original_text: {n}The woman tries to salute you, but the metal cutting through her tendons has cost her the control of her fingers.{/n} "Tanakia Calbergaria, Inquisition acolyte. And, by the grace of Lord Inquisitor Calcazar, the warden of the Epitaph 1 covert facility. Or whatever's left of it."

traits.locale_text: {n}La mujer intenta saludarte, pero el tendón cercenado compromete su control de los dedos.{/n} «Tanakia Calbergaria, acólita de la Inquisición y alcaide de la unidad confidencial Epitafio-1 por gracia del Lord Inquisidor Calcazar. O de lo que queda de ella».
traits.speaker: Tanakia

languages.text: {n}这个女人试着朝你敬个礼，但她的筋腱已经被金属割断了，无法控制自己的手指。{/n}“我是塔娜基娅·卡贝加利亚，审判庭的侍仆。在大审判官卡尔卡扎的授意下，我负责担任荒垄碑碣一号兵器的守护者，只是不知道这玩意儿现在还剩下什么了。”
languages.original_text: {n}The woman tries to salute you, but the metal cutting through her tendons has cost her the control of her fingers.{/n} "Tanakia Calbergaria, Inquisition acolyte. And, by the grace of Lord Inquisitor Calcazar, the warden of the Epitaph 1 covert facility. Or whatever's left of it."

traits.locale_text: {n}这个女人试着朝你敬个礼，但她的筋腱已经被割断了，无法控制自己的手指。{/n}“我是塔娜基娅·卡贝加利亚，审判庭的侍仆。在卡尔卡扎审判长的授意下，我负责担任荒垄碑碣一号绝密兵器的守护者，只是不知道这玩意儿现在还剩下什么了。”
traits.speaker: Tanakia

languages.text: {n}その女性はあなたに敬礼しようとしたが、金属が筋を切り裂いたために指が動かなくなった。{/n}「異端審問庁のアコライト、タナキア・カルベルガリア。ロード・インクィジター・カルカサル卿の恩寵により、エピタフ-1極秘施設の所長を務める。あるいはその残骸といったほうがいいかな」
languages.original_text: {n}The woman tries to salute you, but the metal cutting through her tendons has cost her the control of her fingers.{/n} "Tanakia Calbergaria, Inquisition acolyte. And, by the grace of Lord Inquisitor Calcazar, the warden of the Epitaph 1 covert facility. Or whatever's left of it."

traits.locale_text: {n}その女性はあなたに敬礼しようとしたが、切られた筋のせいで指が動かなくなった。{/n}「異端審問庁のアコライト、タナキア・カルベルガリア。ロード・インクィジター・カルカサル卿の恩寵により、エピタフ-1極秘部隊の番兵を務める。あるいはその残骸といったほうがいいかな」
traits.speaker: Tanakia

languages.text: {n}Die Frau versucht, vor dir zu salutieren, ihre Finger gehorchen ihr wegen der zerschnittenen Sehnen nicht mehr.{/n} "Tanakia Calbergaria, Akolythin der Inquisition. Und durch die Güte des gnädigen Großinquisitors Calcazar Hüterin der streng geheimen Einheit Epitaph 1. Oder was davon übrig ist."
languages.original_text: {n}The woman tries to salute you, but the metal cutting through her tendons has cost her the control of her fingers.{/n} "Tanakia Calbergaria, Inquisition acolyte. And, by the grace of Lord Inquisitor Calcazar, the warden of the Epitaph 1 covert facility. Or whatever's left of it."

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Frau versucht, vor dir zu salutieren, doch ihre Finger gehorchen ihr wegen der zerschnittenen Sehne nicht mehr.{/n} "Tanaka Calbergaria, Akolythin der Inquisition. Auf Befehl des gnädigen Großinquisitors Calcazar Hüterin der streng geheimen Einheit Epitaph-1. Oder was davon übrig ist."
traits.speaker: Tanakia

languages.text: {n}Kadın sana selam vermeye çalışıyor ama tendonlarını kesen metal, parmaklarının kontrolünü imkânsız kılıyor.{/n} "Engizisyon havarisi Tanakia Calbergaria. Lord Engizisyoncu Calcazar'ın lütfuyla gizli 1. Sinyazıt tesisinin muhafızıyım. Tabii geriye bir şey kaldıysa..."
languages.original_text: {n}The woman tries to salute you, but the metal cutting through her tendons has cost her the control of her fingers.{/n} "Tanakia Calbergaria, Inquisition acolyte. And, by the grace of Lord Inquisitor Calcazar, the warden of the Epitaph 1 covert facility. Or whatever's left of it."
